name: Name of the project
Sample settings project
debug: (boolean, defaults: false) Enable debug mode. The script prints every action it takes to stdout
simulate: (boolean, defaults: false) This option will cause the script not to take any action
hidden: (boolean, defaults: true) If set to false it will cause the script to skip all hidden files and folders
checksum: (boolean, defaults: false) Set this setting to true to make the script compare files using a checksum
preserve: (boolean, defaults: true) If set to false removes deleted files
excludes: (array, defaults empty array) Paths and filenames excluded from the synchronization
mode: (string, defaults: sync) Synchronization mode. Possible values: mirror (copy changes from source to target), sync (copy changes in both directions)
